text: The 1911 Volta a Catalunya was the inaugural edition of the Volta a Catalunya cycle race and was held from 6 January to 8 January 1911. The race started and finished in Barcelona. The race was won by . ==Starting cyclists== Of the 33 starting cyclists, 22 finished. The winner, Sebastián Masdeu, received 500 pesetas for his victory. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" |- ! scope="col" | No. ! scope="col" | Name ! scope="col" | City ! scope="col" | Bicycle !
